name: Power Protection Systems Ltd
tag_list: uninterruptible, power-supply, ups, diesel-generator, generator, emergency-power, ups-batteries, riello, emerson, borri, chloride, apc, ups-maintenance, ups-installation, ups-commissioning, generator-installation, power-protection, generator-maintenance,
overview:
Power Protection Systems Ltd design, install and maintain standby power solutions for organisations who require a stable and reliable supply of mains power for their mission critical systems.

Operating nationwide throughout the UK, the company provides independant access to a wide range of UPS Systems, Diesel Generators, Power Distribution and associated products and services which are all designed to address power quality issues.

Range of Services incluldes:

Independent advice Free site surveys UPS Systems, Generators, LV switchgear and Batteries Shutdown software Turnkey solutions Project management Commissioning Services Electrical design, installation and certification Nationwide (UK) Servicing & Maintenance Equipment relocation and disposals
